scss

$spacing_map: (
                      small: 10px,
                      medium: 20px,
                      big: 40px,
                      none: 0
              );

@mixin spacing($top, $right, $bottom, $left) {
  margin: map_get($spacing_map, $top) map_get($spacing_map, $right) map_get($spacing_map, $bottom) map_get($spacing_map, $left);
}

.test {
  @include spacing('small', 'small', 'small', 'small');
}
